mapper.select: select count(1) c from tb_con_payout_plan r, tb_con_contract_info t where r.contract_detail_id = t.contract_id and (r.payout_date > t.end_date or r.payout_date < t.begin_date) and t.contract_id = #{contractId}
select count(1) c from tb_con_repay_plan r, tb_con_contract_info t where r.contract_id = t.contract_id and (r.repay_date > t.end_date or r.repay_date < t.begin_date) and t.contract_id = #{contractId}

select nvl((select sum(r.payout_amt) e from tb_con_payout_plan r where r.contract_detail_id = #{contractId})- (select t.contract_amt f from tb_con_contract_info t where t.contract_id = #{contractId}),0) c from dual

select count(1) c from dual where (select t.end_date from tb_con_contract_info t where t.contract_id =#{contractId}) != (select max(r.repay_date) from tb_con_repay_plan r where r.contract_id =#{contractId})

select nvl((select sum(r.repay_amt) e from tb_con_repay_plan r where r.contract_id = #{contractId} )- (select t.contract_amt f from tb_con_contract_info t where t.contract_id = #{contractId}),0) c from dual
SELECT COUNT( 1 ) c FROM TB_CSMXFE_DETAIL xd WHERE xd.DETAIL_ID =#{approveId} AND xd.DETAIL_TYPE = 'A0' AND xd.ACTIVE = '0'
SELECT count( * ) a FROM tb_con_contract_info WHERE amount_detail_id = #{amountDetailId} AND con_status IN ( '01', '02')
select count(*) a from tb_con_contract_info ci where amount_detail_id = #{amountDetailId} AND con_status in ('03','04','05') and ci.CREDIT_MODE IN ('03','05')

SELECT COUNT( 1 ) c FROM TB_BIZ_AMOUNT_DETAIL_APPROVE WHERE
AMOUNT_DETAIL_ID =#{amountDetailId} AND CREDIT_STATUS = '01' AND BO_USE > 0
SELECT count( * ) c FROM tb_biz_apply r WHERE r.status_type IN ( '01', '02' ) AND r.old_apply_id =#{applyId}
SELECT COUNT(1) c FROM TB_CRD_APPLY WHERE OLD_CRD_ID=#{crdId} AND STATUS_CD IN ('01','02')
SELECT COUNT( 1 ) c FROM TB_CSMXFE_DETAIL xd WHERE xd.DETAIL_ID =#{contractId} AND xd.DETAIL_TYPE = 'C0' AND xd.ACTIVE = '0'
SELECT count( * ) a FROM tb_con_credit_info WHERE con_status IN ( '01', '02' ) AND apply_id = #{applyId}
select count(*) c from tb_biz_apply r where r.old_apply_id = #{applyId} and r.status_type in ('01','02')

select count(1) c from tb_con_contract_info r, tb_biz_amount_detail_approve t, tb_biz_amount_apply a where r.amount_detail_id = t.amount_detail_id and t.amount_id = a.amount_id and a.apply_id = #{applyId} and r.con_status in ('01', '02')
select count(*) a from tb_con_contract_info where con_status in ('01','02') and amount_detail_id = #{amountDetailId}
select count(*) c from tb_con_credit_info r, tb_con_contract_info t where r.old_contract_id = t.xy_id and t.contract_id = #{contractId} and r.con_status in ('01', '02')

select count(*) c from tb_con_contract_info r ,tb_biz_amount_detail_approve a, tb_biz_amount_approve b,tb_biz_approve c,tb_biz_apply d where r.amount_detail_id = a.amount_detail_id and a.amount_id = b.amount_id and b.approve_id = c.approve_id and c.apply_id = d.old_apply_id and d.status_type in ('01','02','09') and r.contract_id =#{contractId}
select count(*) c from tb_loan_info r where r.loan_status in ('01','02') and r.contract_id = #{contractId}
select count(*) c from tb_biz_approve r where r.BECOME_EFFECTIVE_MARK = '07' and r.apply_id = #{applyId}

select nvl(listagg(c.subcontract_num, ',') within group(order by c.subcontract_num), '0') as c from tb_con_contract_info a, tb_con_subcontract_rel b, tb_con_subcontract_t c where a.contract_id = b.contract_id and b.subcontract_id = c.subcontract_id and c.status in ('01', '02') and a.contract_id=#{contractId}
select count(*)c from TB_ADJUST_MARGINCALLS t where t.contract_id=#{contractId} and t.margin_status in('01','02')
select count(*) c from tb_loan_summary r, tb_loan_info t where r.loan_id = t.loan_id and r.summary_status_cd in ('01', '02', '03') and t.contract_id =#{contractId}
select count(*) c from tb_con_contract_info r where nvl(r.cycle_ind_con, '0') = '1' and r.contract_id =#{contractId}

select count(*) c from TB_GRT_REG_CARD t1, TB_GRT_CARD_MORTAGAGE t2, tb_con_contract_info t3, tb_grt_out_detail t4, tb_grt_out t5, tb_grt_mortgage_basic t6 where t1.surety_key_id = t2.surety_key_id and t2.contract_id = t3.contract_id and t4.surety_key_id = t1.surety_key_id and t4.out_id = t5.out_id and t2.surety_id = t6.surety_id and t3.contract_id = #{contractId} and t5.out_type = '22' and t6.MORTGAGE_STATUS = '04'
select count(*) as c from tb_con_contract_info r where r.contract_id =#{contractId} and r.update_time is not null
SELECT NVL(bd.ASSURE_PER,0) BIZ_ASSURE_PER FROM TB_BIZ_AMOUNT_DETAIL_APPROVE bd WHERE bd.AMOUNT_DETAIL_ID=#{amountDetailId}
select count(*) c from tb_loan_info r where r.loan_status = '03' and r.contract_id = #{contractId}
